name: lowcoder
description: Lowcoder is a low-code platform for building internal tools using drag-and-drop components and integrations. It allows teams to quickly assemble dashboards and workflows that can be self-hosted or deployed to cloud providers.
features: Drag-And-Drop Builder: Visual interface, Pre-built components, Rapid development. Build internal tools without coding.
Data Integrations: Database connectors, REST APIs, GraphQL support. Connect to any data source.
Custom Components: Reusable widgets, Component library, Extensible framework. Create your own building blocks.
Workflow Automation: Business logic, Data transformations, Event handlers. Add functionality with JavaScript.
Access Control: Role-based permissions, User management, Audit logs. Secure your internal applications.
Responsive Design: Mobile-friendly, Adaptive layouts, Multi-device support. Build apps that work everywhere.
Version Control: Git integration, Deployment history, Rollback capability. Manage application versions safely.
Self-Hosted: On-premise deployment, Cloud options, Full customization. Deploy where you need it.
